name: BloodMoon
description:
Introducing BloodMoon, an immersive indie multiplayer horror experience seamlessly powered by Steam Relay connectivity.

Embark on a chilling journey with a group of five players, one of whom assumes the sinister role of the killer. Every playthrough unveils a unique, procedurally generated map, ensuring every game is a fresh experience. As the game host takes on the mantle of the killer, the rest must band together as survivors. Your objective: navigate the treacherous terrain, complete crucial tasks, and outsmart the relentless pursuer to secure your survival.

But beware, for this spine-tingling adventure is not for the faint of heart. Brace yourself for heart-pounding moments and nerve-rattling jump scares that will leave you on the edge of your seat
